## esQuery variable

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> Import helpers from the "<!-- -->@<!-- -->kbn/es-query" package directly instead.  8.1
>

```typescript

    buildEsQuery: typeof import("@kbn/es-query").buildEsQuery;
```
